Ball - Class in Objects
Ball class to initiate the ball used in the game
Ball(Point2D, float, float, Color, Color) - Constructor for class Objects.Ball
Creates new ball object with specified center coordinates, radius, inner and border color
ballEnd() - Method in class Objects.Wall
Returns true if the ball count is 0 or false otherwise
ballReset() - Method in class Objects.Wall
Resets the ball and paddle back to the startpoint and resets the balls xspeed and yspeed to a random integer between 1 and 3
